name: Bolinas.github.io
tagline: Rule Extraction and Parsing Tools for Synchronous Hyperedge Replacement Grammars
body:
### Welcome to Bolinas.

This is the new public home for Bolinas.

You can find our repository here: [Bolinas](https://www.github.com/karlmoritz/bolinas)

To clone the code (read-only), use the following command:

    git clone git://github.com/karlmoritz/bolinas.git

If you are interested in contributing to the code, please fork a copy of the repository and then check-in any updates via a pull request.

### Authors and Contributors

* Jacob Andreas @jacobandreas
* Daniel Bauer @daniel-bauer
* David Chiang
* Karl Moritz Hermann @karlmoritz
* Bevan Jones
* Kevin Knight
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
